title: Sidewall, ca. 1730
medium: Ink and water color on handmade paper
inscribed: Stamped on verso:  "G.R." excise stamp (serial letter L).
description: Large, fantastic flowers connected by branches, in the manner of chintzes; polychrome, with black contours, on unpainted ground. Paint rubbed off on numerous places. On back: excise stamp with faintly visible G R.

tombstone.epitaph:
Sidewall, ca. 1730.
ca. 1730. Ink and water color on handmade paper. Gift of Roger Warner. 1955-144-6.
